articles.title: Serum Institute of India flags off first consignment of R21/Matrix-M Malaria vaccine to Africa - CNBC TV18 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The vaccine is developed in collaboration with the University of Oxford and Novavax’s Matrix-M adjuvant. Adar Poonawalla, and the Ambassador of the United States of America to India, Eric Garcetti flagged off the first consignment of R21/Matrix-M malaria vacc…
articles.content: Vaccine manufacturer Serum Institute of India has begun exports of the 'R21/Matrix-M' malaria vaccine to Africa. The vaccine is developed in collaboration with the University of Oxford and Novavaxs M… [+1184 chars]

articles.title: Katy Perry sings goodbye to ‘American Idol’ - CNN
articles.description: Katy Perry said her goodbyes on “American Idol” after seven seasons.
articles.content:
Katy Perry said her goodbyes on American Idol after seven seasons.
